attributes.action: Demand a General Election to resolve the Brexit dilemma & give us back our vote
attributes.additional_details: Refusal by the house to back a general election whilst also not allowing the Prime Minister the opportunity to negotiate on our behalf using all the tools which could be available to him. We are constantly being told that there is no mandate for no deal so allow an election and we will then know the mandate
attributes.background: To allow us to voice our opinions through voting, on Brexit and the way it has been handled by parliament
